test_your_xhosa_knowledge: Lekani tshiwana tshenu tsha Xhosa na Sazi na muta wawe nga u swikela kha dzifundo dzashu dzinwe na dzinwe! Khethani zwilemo zwenu, phendulani mbudziso dzi si vhavhili, kana ni sedze zwiphuzo u thoma u funa zwino.
beginner_no_or_basic_knowledge: Yo Thoma (A Huna kana Tshiwana tsha Vhukati)
what_is_in_xhosa: Ndi zwifhio zwine zwa reng "{{english}}" nga Xhosa?
nice_try_correct_answer: Ni tshimbidze zwavhudi! Zwo phendulwa zwo nepa ndi {{answer}}.
test_your_xhosa_knowledge_full: Lekani tshiwana tshenu tsha Xhosa na Sazi na muta wawe nga u swikela kha dzifundo dzashu dzinwe na dzinwe! Kha Saz’ isiXhosa, no Sapho, ri khou tshimbidza vhafundi vha minwaha yothe u vhona u vhudi lwa lwambo lwa Xhosa na tshikale. Khethani zwilemo zwenu—yo thoma, magareng, kana mutshimbidzi/mulume wa lwambo—mme ni phendule mbudziso dzi si vhavhili u lekanya u vha na vhuḓi. Ni nga sedza zwiphuzo u thoma u funa nga u fhinga.
our_site_offers: Saidi yashu i fha sebaka se se mofuthu, se se khou ḓivhadza u funa nga maluvha, mitalo, zwinomboro, thambelo ya lwambo, na vhuḓi vha tshikale. U bva kha thabo ya Ukuxoxa Iintsomi (u amba zwiṅwe) u ya kha vhuḓi vha lwambo vho shumisaho, ri khou kopanya tshikale na u funa ha zwino. Vhonani tshigaba tshashu tsha Tshikale u vhona zwiṅwe zwa Transkei kana ni lekane Zwiito zwashu u ita hore u funa hu vhe hu ḓivha. Ri ḓivhe Xhosa ri tshi khou ḓivha mmogo!
